News

Kitis Cat Yoga

06.03.2023

Do you know the feeling when you really want to do Yoga, but there just arent enough cats around?
Well, now that won't be a problem anymore.
Every monday and thursday evening, we offer yoga sessions with a professional yogi. And our cats will be there for mental support.

Renovations complete!

23.02.2023

After a few months of work, we can finally show you our new interior!
There are many spots for the cats to relax at. We have new comfortable sofas and a brand new bar.
Come over check it out for yourself!

History

This is how everything started

Grand Opening

July 2022

Kitis Kitties opens its doors to the public. The cat cafe is the first of its kind in Turku and quickly becomes a popular spot for cat lovers and cafe-goers alike. Customers enjoy sipping coffee and nibbling on pastries while playing with the resident cats

Cat Yoga

August 2022

Kitis Kitties launches a new program called "Cat Yoga." Customers can now attend yoga classes with the resident cats in a separate room at the cafe. The cats are free to roam around and interact with the participants during the yoga practice, creating a unique and relaxing experience for both humans and felines. The program becomes very popular and attracts a lot of media attention, drawing even more customers to the cafe.

New Merch

September 2022

Kitis Kitties expands its offerings to include a retail section featuring cat-themed merchandise. The new section includes everything from clothing and accessories to toys and treats for cats. The expansion is a hit with customers, many of whom take home souvenirs and gifts for their own pets or loved ones who are cat enthusiasts.

New Cat Treats

December 2022

Kitis Kitties introduces a new line of cat-friendly snacks and treats. Working with a local pet food company, the cafe's staff has developed a variety of healthy and delicious snacks that are specifically designed to appeal to cats' tastes and nutritional needs. The snacks come in a range of flavors and textures, from crunchy biscuits to soft and chewy treats, and are made with high-quality ingredients such as real meat, fish, and vegetables. The new line is a hit with customers, many of whom are excited to bring home some treats for their own pets or as gifts for their cat-loving friends. The cafe plans to continue expanding its offerings to include more cat-themed products and services, with the ultimate goal of becoming a one-stop shop for all things feline.

Adoption Event

January 2023

Kitis Kitties partners with a local animal shelter to host adoption events. Once a month, the cafe sets up a special area where visitors can meet and play with adoptable cats from the shelter. The events are a huge success, with many cats finding their forever homes through the partnership. Kitis Kitties becomes known not only as a great place to hang out with cats, but also as a community hub for animal lovers.

Big Renovations

March 2023

Kitis Kitties undergoes a major renovation and expansion. The cafe doubles its seating capacity, adds more play areas for the cats, and introduces new services such as cat grooming and boarding. The renovation also includes a new outdoor patio area where customers can enjoy their coffee and pastries while watching the cats play in a secure outdoor space. The expansion and upgrades make Kitis Kitties an even more popular destination for cat lovers and cafe-goers in Turku.
